overview: Many years ago, there lived an Emperor, Friedhelm, who wanted so much new clothes that he spent all his money to be properly cleaned. One day, three scammers with a ruse, came along who pretended to be weavers, Jacob, Maja and Greta.  "The clothes are so special, that they are invisible to any who are hopelessly dumb or unworthy of office."
title: Des Kaisers neue Kleider
